description: New Eden School of Natural Health & Herbal Studies offers the best accredited distance learning educational programs.
sitename: New Eden School of Natural Health
cleaned_text: Natural Health Improves Lives. Changing the world one individual at a time. [Enroll](https://www.newedenschoolofnaturalhealth.org/apply-now/) today and begin to make a difference! Special New [Doctor of Naturopathy (ND) All eBooks Degree Program](https://www.newedenschoolofnaturalhealth.org/naturopathy-doctor/) with video classes and virtual internship! EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMS WE OFFER [Naturopathy Programs](#) Associate Degree in Naturopathy Doctor of Naturopathy (ND) Naturopathic Practitioner (NP) Naturopathic Counselor (NC) [Read More](https://www.newedenschoolofnaturalhealth.org/traditional-naturopathy/) [Natural Health Programs](#) Natural Health Consultant (NHC) Certified Natural Health & Fitness Specialist (C.N.F.S) Natural Health Practitioner (NHP) Professional Diploma Program (Video Classes) [Read More](https://www.newedenschoolofnaturalhealth.org/natural-health-programs/) [Nutrition and Wellness ](#) Nutritional Counselor (CNC) Health Foods & Nutrition Adviser (H.N.S.A) Certified Nutritional Wellness Counselor (C.N.W.C) Certified Sports & Fitness Professional (C.S.F.P) [Read More](https://www.newedenschoolofnaturalhealth.org/nutrition-and-wellness/) [Herbal Program [Holistic (C.R.) [Read More](https://www.newedenschoolofnaturalhealth.org/holistic-curriculums/) Video Classes for a CAHP Bachelor's Degree in Complementary and Alternative Health [Read More](https://www.newedenschoolofnaturalhealth.org/complementary-alter-health/) An Accredited Distance Learning School of the Natural Healing Arts New Eden School offers exceptional online education programs in the natural healing arts. Unlike traditional schools, we offer online classes and degrees in natural medicine that are easily accessible to anyone, anywhere, anytime. We also cover reflexology and herbal sciences in our courses. Our programs are fully accredited and approved and allow individuals to pursue courses of study based on natural healing remedies and herbal studies. Whether you are considering an [Alternative Medicine degree](https://www.newedenschoolofnaturalhealth.org/clinical-natural-medicine/), [Holistic Health Practitioner degree](https://www.newedenschoolofnaturalhealth.org/holistic-curriculums/), [Certified natural health counselor diploma](https://www.newedenschoolofnaturalhealth.org/natural-health-programs/), or [Naturopathic practitioner training](https://www.newedenschoolofnaturalhealth.org/traditional-naturopathy/), you can get comprehensive training and education from a professional school. Our courses are offered virtually and provide the same level of in-depth exploration as a brick and mortar University. Graduates of each program are well-equipped with the skills and knowledge needed to pursue their career goals confidently. Whether our students are pursuing an [herbal medicine degree](https://www.newedenschoolofnaturalhealth.org/herbal-programs/), Doctor of Naturopathy degree, or [nutritional counselor training](https://www.newedenschoolofnaturalhealth.org/nutrition-and-wellness/), we offer complete courses on each subject. Complement your existing business or practice In addition to starting out in a chosen career path, our courses act as a complement to any existing natural health practice. We provide courses such as [Aromatherapy courses](https://www.newedenschoolofnaturalhealth.org/aromatherapy/), [functional medicine courses](https://www.newedenschoolofnaturalhealth.org/clinical-natural-medicine/), [energy medicine courses](https://www.newedenschoolofnaturalhealth.org/energy-medicine-programs/), Iridology training, and more. At New Eden, we are proud to be able to offer such enriching courses that allow our students to expand on their existing knowledge or begin pursuing a fulfilling path in the natural healing arts. Our educational programs are very affordable and are offered at a discount if pre-paid, or you can study a course at a time by purchasing a course at a time. You pay as you go. Distance learning is the most cost effective way to obtain quality education
